subject: Appointments and Executive Changes
College Athletics
Suspensions, Dismissals and Resignations
Colleges and Universities
lead_paragraph: The removal of Julie Roe Lach came after the N.C.A.A. said its investigators had violated its own rules while examining accusations that a booster provided improper benefits to students.
snippet: The removal of Julie Roe Lach came after the N.C.A.A. said its investigators had violated its own rules while examining accusations that a booster provided improper benefits to students.
